name: Deep Assault
description:
Gear up and defeat your enemies in this dark and limited-sight adventure, where you command a soldier and constantly move downwards! Test your attention by keeping your rapidly descending character away from the green lights and avoid the deadly machine coming towards you from above as fast as you can! and compete with yourself by scoring more with each try!

Enjoy non-stop excitement as you manage a fast and agile robot soldier!
Experiment yourself for a better score by specializing in this game with endless gameplay!
Take down enemies waiting in various locations to block you as fast as you can with your weapon!
Watch out for the dangerous machine coming towards you from above and try to keep your character away from the green lights!
